```{r setup}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath(".."))
```

# Creating the function

```{r}
require(tidyverse)
require(jsonlite)
require(stringr)
require(data.table)
require(clusterSim)
```

```{r}
df <- PubChemParse(c("6618", "2244", "120228"), db = NULL, db.bypass = TRUE)
```

# Setting up variables
```{r}
compounds = unlist(str_split("6618\n1983\n120228", "\n"))
```


# Calling the function

```{r}
df.temp <- SelectSections(df,
                       pharm_bio = TRUE,
                       pharm_bio_sections = "Pharmacology",
                       use_manufacturing = TRUE,
                       use_manufacturing_sections = NULL,
                       identification = TRUE,
                       identification_sections = NULL,
                       safety = TRUE,
                       safety_sections = NULL,
                       toxicity = TRUE,
                       toxicity_sections = NULL,
                       literature = TRUE,
                       literature_sections = NULL,
                       bio_path = TRUE,
                       bio_path_sections = NULL)
```
